targets.query:
from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BRN/BLI/$device/elec/solar/solar/P")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["BRN/BLI/$device/elec/solar/solar/P"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

panels.title: Device Wise - Last Hour - Power Consumption

targets.query:
from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> drop(columns: ["E", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["P", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["f", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["pf", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["v_avg", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["i_avg", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["vA_rms", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["vB_rms", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["vC_rms", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["ap_total", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> drop(columns: ["E", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["P", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["f", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["pf", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["v_avg", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["i_avg", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["vA_rms", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["vB_rms", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["vC_rms", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["ap_total", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> yield()

list.definition:
from(bucket: "BLI")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> distinct(column: "device")
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: false)
  |> yield()
list.label: device
list.name: device

  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "BRN")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "BLI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.P/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> distinct(column: "device")
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: false)
  |> yield()
